dct_title_s: Plan of the bay, town, fortifications, and environs, of St. Pierre, in the island of Martinique
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. Depths shown by soundings. Engraved by T. Jefferys. "495." To left of title: Hydrographical Office. Indexed for points of reference. Historic Maps copy has label on verso: West Indies. Martinique--St. Pierre Bay, Town Fortifications and Environs. 495.
dct_publisher_sm: [London] : Published according to Act of Parliament by Capt. Hurd RN Hydrographer to the Admiralty, 8th Sept. 1814.
